pages.text: The $(mob)Heatscar Spider$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_spider)$(mob)Spider$() that spawns in the $(thing)Nether$(). Compared to normal $(l:minecraft_spider)$(mob)Spiders$(), it is much bigger, thougher and is resistant to fire.$(p)When killed it spawns several $(l:natura_babyheatscarspider)$(mob)Baby Heatscar Spiders$().

$(mob)Heatscar Spiders$() and $(l:natura_babyheatscarspider)$(mob)Baby Heatscar Spiders$() drop $(item)Flamestring$() on death. It can be used to make various $(item)Bows$() with the wood of the various tress of the $(thing)Nether$()
